docs.text: awesome-giants A curated list of seminal works of Science and Mathematics in their original or republished editions. “ If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.” ― Isaac Newton letter to Robert Hooke, 1675 Contents Leonhard Euler Joseph Fourier Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Isacc Newton Dennis Ritchie Ken Thompson Alan Turing Leonhard Euler Introductio in analysin infinitorum, volume 1 Introductio in analysin infinitorum, volume 2 Joseph Fourier Théorie Analytique de la Chaleur Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Nova Methodus pro Maximis et Minimis De geometria recondite et analysi indivisibilium atque infinitorum Isacc Newton Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy Dennis Ritchie The C Programming Language Unix Ken Thompson Go Unix Alan Turing Computing Machinery and Intelligence Contribute Contributions welcome!
